Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: the place is speakasy. So if you expect super strong cocktails, jazz music and quiet evening then it is place to be. But do not expect good party vibe. The cocktails price is 15€

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: A hidden gem, quite literally. Cocktails are beautifully made, the atmosphere is just wonderful

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Awesome, speakeasy-type bar! Excellent cocktails! The service is amazing as well!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Such a lovely personalized cocktail bar experience. First 5 star for a bar and they totally earned it. Friendly staff with excellent recommendations. They come and greet you at the door, take your coat, give you killer recs, stop by with …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Amazing find! Super cozy, quirky interior with incredible cocktails. I can see myself here on a cold winter evening. Service was wonderful. Definitely recommended. Expect to pay around 15 euro per cocktail

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Delicious cocktails. Love that they're using the outside as a terrace right now - before this bar was very hidden and could feel inaccessible. Now I can drop by on a sunny day and enjoy the sunshine!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Not only were the cocktails amazing, the service was next level. Your water glass is kept filled, we were given great advice, and it’s all these little details that made the service absolutely EXCEPTIONAL. Unlike other cocktail bars I’ve …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Exquisite drinks for people who appreciate cocktails as an art form. The bartenders are masters of their craft. Make sure to grab a seat at the bar to watch them at work. They also have an impressively curated selection of craft beers, along with whiskeys and other fine liquors. An absolute gem of a bar.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: It used to be speak easy (what I preferred), not anymore due to covid. Great cocktails and service, good place for a conversation. Good vibes and beautiful decorations, one of my fav cocktail bars in Amsterdam.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Awesome place. Drinks and service are amazing. Will visit again. Due to local restrictions, everything closes early at this time.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: I visited Bar Oldenhof for the first time last night and LOVED it! If you are looking for a unique experience in a cozy, high-end, sophisticated environment, this is your spot! The staff is extremely knowledgable and attentive, the seating …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Stepping into Bar oldenhof is like stepping into a time machine. Transporting you to a time when waiters offered you water right from the moment you sit down, and continue to keep you hydrated throughout the evening. A time where the jazz …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Super nice place for cocktails. The staff was friendly and welcoming. It looks gorgeous.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Fantastic cocktails, the bartenders really know what they are doing. Great customer experience with the perfect drink for everyone. We will be back!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: An absolute gem in the Amsterdam cocktail scene. Very friendly and experienced staff with a changing and delicious drink menu. Try any of the champagne cocktails or the extensive whisky collection!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Excellent cocktails! We got the le fleur du paradis and penicillin. Very old school decor, two floors, can take bigger party upstairs, they also have a few seatings outside. Lovely staff!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Best signature cocktails in town

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great experience. The staff are very attentive and knowledgeable. Everything we had was delicious. We had three different cocktails, two of which were recommendations, and three tapas, which were all unique dishes. The atmosphere was lovely.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Place to be in the Jordaan if you like great cocktails. Service is on top. Bar tenders are very professional. Coming again.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Hidden gem with great drinks and staff. More than just a quick drink but experience

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Nice hidden bar but not as great as expected. The cocktails we had, had odd flavours. I would prefer a bar like Tales and Spirits. The prices are the same, about €15 for a cocktail, but we enjoyed the ones at T&S much more. Ps: if you want …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Marik was lovely to us. The service was superb and I've never experienced such artful and deliciously complex cocktails.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Classic style with a mix of english, french and NYC style of a cosy home. Wide variety of cocktails, Martini, and beer collections, i recommend trying the cocktails

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Amazing place! Wonderful ambience, great cocktails and superb service. Call and make a reservation (ignore what the website says). A favouritel

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Very special, and great service. Drinks were delicious.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: The cocktails are super good, also the staff was special. The bartender was super friendly and told us all the detailed stories of the cocktails. You have to be lucky to find a seat.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: A hidden gem. Amazing place, nice music, great cocktails and the most kind staff in Amsterdam.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Cozy warm environment, relaxing decor, great attention from staff, took our coats, replenished my water (which I needed at this point in my night!) constantly. Delicious drinks!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Thinking about this review i felt a bit like Gollum. Not wanting to share my precious... …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text:
If you're looking for awesome cocktails and great service, this is the place.

They have a pretty extensive menu with plenty of options and the bartenders can …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Amazing cocktails. The bartender and the waiters really know their cocktails. Pricey.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: My favourite cocktail bar in Amsterdam. Always busy, but worth the wait. Great selection of whisky too! If you’re a local make sure to go for a whisky tasting, they hold them every few months.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text:
A beautiful slice of the old world. Perfect cocktails.

Find this place, dark and curtained off from the world, ring the doorbell and …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: very cozy fancy place! Nice creative cocktails, good staffs!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Cool speakeasy type bar. Cocktails are great, and they have a wide range of great spirit brands. The atmosphere is chilled and, opposite to many other speakeasies, it's not too noisy, so you can enjoy a good conversation. Would recommend!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Excellent cocktail bar; top notch drinks list, great service & plush seats. The only reason I've withheld a star is that we had seats right at the end of the bar which meant too much overhearing the bar staff gossip, break glasses. Overall, really worth the trip, especially for couples or a special occasion

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great seasonal cocktails, great staff and very cozy and relaxed atmosphere. They have some area upstairs, but the place is not large and doesn't take large groups - so if you're a group, make sure to book/check in advance. Also allow them some door wait time.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Always top quality service, always top quality cocktails. Very unique atmosphere (for Amsterdam), intimate, elegant but still sort of low key. Definitely a place to come back to.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: This bar is an experience! Such an amazing time, you feel spoiled and cherished. The gin and tonic is perfect, the bartender is so skilled and nice. Price for a cocktail is 16 euros but it's worth every cent.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: One of those places you feel you shouldn't review because you don't want to share it with anyone else. A small, intimate, cosy cocktail bar, and owing to the method of entry, it possesses a slightly secluded, private, speakeasy feel. Staff …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Classical styled bar with interior reminiscent of the old 50s (or 20s?). Vast selection of whiskeys and exquisite cocktails. Very forthcoming and service oriented staff. Team knows their trade very thoroughly and may help alleviate your choice if asked. Great experience.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text:
Really good cocktails, in a nice cozy and fancy environment.
Big shout out to the waiters crew, all very nice and extremely profesional!
Cocktails are not cheap (14-16 euro) but definitely recommended!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Excellent drinks but you'll most likely have to wait to be seated. Depending on the line, it can be 15 - 45 minutes before they'll let you in. …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: What a unique bar. Came here around 7pm on Monday and am one of the three customers. The whole place has less than 10 tables I think. It has a second floor attic area. Love the vibe and decent drink menu. …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great experience. Great cocktails, great ambiance and great service. Cocktail selection pretty vast, then some. You can order from the menu or make your own drinks.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: We had a fantastic time at Bar Oldenhof. The waiters were lovely--spoke with us several times at the door as we waited, were very friendly and polite, and made us feel at home. The atmosphere was relaxed but elegant, and the drinks were complex and delicious. All in all, a great experience.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great bar for a cocktail, if you are up to try something different. The cocktails we had where interesting but my cup of cocktail, thanks for a different Sunday.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Such a good Speakeasy, cocktails are delicious, staff is super friendly and knowledge. The place a super intimate. Highly recommend!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Recently went to this cozy cocktail bar, and it was amazing! First off, there's only one small 'bar' sign outside. You can't see inside and you have to ring the doorbell to be let in. …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Enjoy a well-crafted, unique libation as you swirl from the comfort of a lounge chair with light jazz in the background? This is your spot! Mixologists know their trade very well & are focused on a customer-first experience. You will not regret stopping by!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Amazing place, very polite staff. And the cocktails were really worth the price. I would recommend it and surely i would go there again. It was a bit hard to find but dont give up! Its behind secret curtains. ;)

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Always an intimate, cosy and well groomed experience at Bar Oldenhof. A true gem when it comes to service experience combined with delicate, beautifully crafted cocktails - slightly on the pricier side but totally worth it.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Beautiful cocktail bar, my favorite speakeasy in Amsterdam. Michelle is amazing! I forgot the name of the waiter, but he also took a good care of me. I highly recommend it!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: A place to savour some cocktails and hold a  conversation.  We each had an amazingly well foamed whiskey sour as our night cap.. all of us were still reminiscing how great it tastes on the following day when we departed Amsterdam. Will return and recommend.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: It is one of the best Bar experiences you can have in the city. Perfect for enthusiasts. The owner is amazing and the rest of their staff consists of people who love alcohol. They really know their craft well.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Amazing as always. My all time favourite. For tonight... Female empowerment in prohibition setting. Bo is a top notch mixologist and I'd recommend ordering off menu. Marla is amazing in making you feel at home and as no other communicates …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: We spent New Years Eve at this cocktail bar and really enjoyed it. The staff were attentive and helpful. Would highly recommend visiting. We definitely will when we are back in Amsterdam.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Don’t miss this hidden gem - wait at the entrance to be showed to a table. Atmosphere is calm, relaxed sophisticated without being stuffy.  Bar man is a cocktail magician! Highly recommend

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: This hidden gem is so delightful. The cocktail are amazing. The atmosphere is wonderful. You have to know where this bar is and then ring the bell to be let in. It's a great secret place.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Bad customer service!! I mean I am from Amsterdam so I know how bad it can get but this experience was really the worst I have ever had! We were having cocktails of 15 euro’s a piece and a friend of ours wanted to join us. He was not let …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Amazing speak-easy style cocktail bar. Easily the best in Amsterdam. Impeccable service. Try to dress appropriately, avoid sneakers if possible, and no big group of guys on busy nights.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text:
Lovely speakeasy, the atmosphere and setting is perfectly formed and is very relaxing.
The bartender was really friendly and helpful and the drinks were excellent. Highly recommend.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: We search for great bars and we found one of the best at Bar Oldenhof in Amsterdam. Great cocktails put together with care and precision in a beautiful bar. Highly recommend for the real cocktail enthusiast.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: A real speakeasy bar, with highly skilled bartenders and service. You'll jump back in time, and get in a bar from the Thirties. Service talks to you in a special way, places are limited cos you have quite some room between tables, …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: An exceptional service and a master bartender. I enjoyed every minute spent here

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great place with a warm and welcoming staff and atmosphere. The cocktails are of highest quality and tailored to everyone's particular tastes

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Such a cool bar, going for a drink here is a total experience. The service is just great and the signature cocktails are just great!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: There are a handful of great cocktail bars in amsterdam and this is one of them. This is setup a bit classier than some of the others, somewhat of a 1950's and chesterfield chairs look. The owner is really friendly and service oriented.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Apart from the best whiskey sour I had, bartender and waitress was so nice. Classy ambiance. Deserves more than 5 star!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Friendly bartenders in tuxedo vests making the best cocktails you've ever had. Can't say enough about this place, I just love it. Ring the bell if it looks closed and they will come let you in.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Amazing cocktails in an great intimate atmosphere. You have to wait at the door, sometimes for a bit, so be sure to have a jacket on if it's cold out.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great atmosphere, great service, great presentation. We spent an hour there for the first time and came back 2 days later. They remembered all of our drinks and the fact that one of our party was not with us.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Beautiful space and really excellent cocktails

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Decent cocktails and friendly staff. The atmosphere looked nice downstairs but upstairs where we were placed was a bit lacking (being right next to the toilets didn't help).

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Very very good cocktails. Knowledgeable bar staff who are friendly and helpful. Would not hesitate to recommend this bar to anyone looking for a relaxed drink.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: A great alternative to a loud and lively bar. If you want to chill and chat this the place. It's a very cosy place. Cocktails are made well by a very friendly and formal bar man.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: I went here based on the high ratings. And it was quite disappointing. The place was empty and it took about 40 minutes to get a drink delivered to my table. After the ridiculous wait, we decided to leave and go somewhere else. The drinks …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Super staff and wonderfull bar

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Just a very great and sophisticated experience at the Oldenhof! Cocktails were so good! And the atmosphere is more than amazing! The staff are very very polite and professionals!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: My favourite cocktail bar in Amsterdam? cozy, dark and nice atmosphere, cocktails are expensive but very well made, so if you like good cocktails this is the right place

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Super cool space, it makes you feel like you are in another time and place. Very good Gin and Tonics, great recommendations based on your preferences, even though their specialty is Whiskey :)

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Big rat literally just walked out of the bathrooms! 🐀 nice cocktails though. But even after mentioning it was boiling inside three times, they didn’t turn the AC on. 🔥

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: No need to detail very much, probably the best cocktail bar in Amsterdam:) The experience overall is simply amazing.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Really nice bar to have a good cocktail.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great atmosphere! Cozy. They don't let it get crowded so it if can get in you will then enjoy an atmospheric evening with some classy drinks!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Overrated place, the cocktails were ok but nothing special and the staff not as professional and kind as expected. Just another hipster bar for tourists in Amsterdam. Toilets were dirty. Disappointed.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Marla is the best!!!!  Very amazing cocktails. Great interior and atmosphere. Perfect service

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Find hard to understand why this is rated as one of the best cocktail bars in the city. Makes me think their customers are easily impressed by arrogant staff and basic standards.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Beautiful bar, incredible staff, amazing whiskys. If you're looking for a cosy and intimate bar away from the hustle and bustle then look no further.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Place is overrated and overpriced. 16€ for a cocktail with a very poor service for us as the waiter was nervous and full of himself. I do not recommend this place if you only have a few days in town.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: I literally just went to this bar on a recommendation for the area after a meal elsewhere. Sadly, I didn't get to try any drinks as the staff that greeted me inside rudely told me that they don't allow shorts or 'sneakers' whilst they …

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Don't tell the barmen it's a cocktail bar ! Their specialty is the whiskey ! But of course they are doing really great cocktails :) Service really friendly.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Excellent service, amazing cocktails, wonderful atmosphere! Really enjoyed our early visit today.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Best cocktails in Amsterdam. Served by knowledgable and polite staff, the interior is reminiscent of a gentlemans club providing a relaxing atmosphere. Definitely recommend "pennicilin".

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great and unique cocktails, amazing and special staff. Highly recommend!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Beautiful, romantically cozy bar with amazing service and extensive cocktail selection. Doesn't take reservations and can get quite busy!

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great bar with wide selection of whiskeys and cocktails. Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Relaxed vibe in the bar.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Great cocktails and service. I like the atmosphere here.

Review Text: Good cocktails and polite staff. Bar also proves a nice atmosphere

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Super knowledgeable and friendly bartenders. This combined with the classy interior creates a perfect place for a conversation.

Name: bar Oldenhof

Name: bar Oldenhof

Name: bar Oldenhof

Name: bar Oldenhof

Review Text: Excellent friendly service, tailored drink recommendations, and fantastic cocktails. Excellent selection of whiskey also.

Name: bar Oldenhof
Review Text: Stepped right into a 1920s speakeasy. Wonderful hidden gem with elegant service and fantastic cocktails. Highlight of Amsterdam, for sure.

Review Text:
The best bar in Amsterdam and more!
